## Carousel

This is the description for my class.

### Parameters

-   `settings` **[Object][6]** A config object

### Examples

```javascript
new Carousel({
     autoPlay: 5000, //ms
     animationTime: 5000,//ms
     visibleItemCount: 2,
     transitionTimingFunction: "linear", // linear, ease, ease-in, ease-out, ease-in-out
     center: true,
     vCenter: true,
     loop: true
});
```
